name: SaveTheCake
description:
Help the Grandma!!!

The bug invasion has begun and she just wanted to eat her cake... if the cake is gone she will be really sad! Can you kill them all? Have fun trying :D The slaughtering will begin.

This little fun game was created during the WOWIE GameJam. The topic was intentional bugs and I had no crazy ideas so I went with the most obwious interpretation;D

My work is done... its 5am in the morning I'm tired af and are going to sleep now. Now its your part! I'd apreciate some feedback!:DCya
Tarek
